name: Asteroid Demolition Corps
description:
Asteroid Demolition Corps is a space shooter that allows you to take full control of your ship. Protect the Earth from endless waves of asteroids and unknown alien civilizations trying to mine them. Engage in epic space dogfights against dozens of enemy fighters, destroy asteroids to capture the resources inside of them, and use those resources to help you and your allies.

What we've implemented so far.

At the moment ADC is a space battle simulator where you control your fighter. The core mechanics (movement and combat) are almost complete, as we plan to add a targeting system and tracking missiles in the upcoming update.

Controls

Mouse for Steering the ship

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

W - Speed Up
